channel.title: Rust on Sami Jaktholm
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Sami Jaktholm

item.title: aws-kms-crypt
item.description: aws-kms-crypt is a cross-language utility for managing application secrets within AWS using the KMS service. The key features of this tool are: Features Interoperable - Interoperable implementations for Bash, NodeJS, Python and Rust. Secure - AES encryption with KMS generated data keys. Simple - Simple API for encrypting and decrypting sensitive data in all supported languages. Installation Node.js module in NPM: https://www.npmjs.com/package/aws-kms-crypt Python package in PyPi: https://pypi.
